casebody.data:
IN RE: REDMOND 86A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 21, 2016 Edwin A. Pressly, Attorney at Law, Statesville, Elizabeth M. Haddix, Attorney at Law, Pittsboro, Mark Dorosin, Attorney at Law, for Nicols, Linda (Administratrix), et al. Marc X. Sneed, Assistant Attorney General, Amar Majmundar, Special Deputy Attorney General, Elizabeth A. Fisher, Assistant Solicitor General, Olga Vysotskaya de Brito, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Johanna Schoen, for Johanna Schoen, Ph.D.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of October 2016 by State of NC for Withdrawal and Substitution of Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of October 2016."
